title: Which country has the strictest schools? - Quora

response.answer_text: It sure isn’t the US, in America there are rules and laws that contridict with the principles required to maintain a strict school, not to mention social norms that can’t be looked down on. Itt can’t be a country in Africa (do I even need to explain why?) I would say that it has to be an Asian country. My best guesses are China of Japan. (The UK might have some strict schools)
